attr.title: The Last Game
attr.desc: Traverse the dungeon in this awesome action / bullet-hell roguelite where every choice could make or break your run. Stack over 130 different items and create powerful synergies to become truly overpowered with 13 unique characters!
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam, open the Steam console and paste the folowing text to download a compatible version: download_depot 2563800 2563801 879463373856549854 and copy TheLastGame.pck into the gamedata folder. You can also use the free demo, add it into your Steam library and use this Steam console command to download a compatible version: download_depot download_depot 2964420 2964421 3185082754256006513. Devices with rk3326 cpu are not recommended because of low performance
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [Steam](store.steampowered.com/app/2563800/The_Last_Game/), open the Steam console and paste the folowing text to download a compatible version: `download_depot 2563800 2563801 879463373856549854` and copy `TheLastGame.pck` into the `gamedata` folder. You can also use the free demo, add it into your Steam library and use this Steam console command to download a compatible version: `download_depot download_depot 2964420 2964421 3185082754256006513`. Devices with rk3326 cpu are not recommended because of low performance
